channel.title: Compile Error
channel.description:
When I try to compile the server and client I get this error.
javac: file not found.\Bulby\.\io\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files>
This is how my compiler is set up:
@echo off Title Compiler cd .. "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ./Bin/ ./Bulby/./io/*.java pause

item.title: Compile Error
item.dc:creator: @Evil1 Evil_
item.description:
@Evil1 wrote:

There’s a sticky at the top of the page for compiler help/questions. Please repost in that thread.

Locked.

item.title: Compile Error
item.dc:creator: @zrickz zrickz
item.description:
@zrickz wrote:

When I try to compile the server and client I get this error.

javac: file not found.\Bulby.\io*.java
Usage: javac

This is how my compiler is set up:

@echo off
Title Compiler
cd …
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe” -cp . -d ./Bin/ ./Bulby/./io/*.java
pause
